1.title: Vampire Hunters & Killer Clowns
1.plot: Jonathan London hosts an all-new Pause/Play, bringing you all the best of what's new to DVD and Blu-ray. Out this week? Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter, Magic Mike, Killer Klowns from Outer Space.

2.title: Halloween Special with the Campaign & a Christmas Story 2
2.plot: Jonathan London hosts an all-new Pause/Play, bringing you all the best of what's new to DVD and Blu-ray. Out this week? The Campaign, A Christmas Story 2, Universal Classic Monsters: The Essential Collection.

3.title: An Amazing Amazing Spider-Man Rant
3.plot: When he's not busy chewing bubblegum or kicking ass, Jonathan London's reviewing the best new releases on DVD/Blu-ray. This week, he takes you through the finer points of the They Live Collector's Edition, has an amazing rant about The Amazing Spider-Man, and brings in a "special" guest to intro The Muppet Christmas Carol 20th Anniversary Collection.

4.title: Ninja Turtles & Animated Bears
4.plot: Jonathan London puts down the pizzas and nun-chucks to bring you this week's releases on Blu-Ray and DVD. This week, we've got the Brave Ultimate Collector's Edition, as well as the awesome Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Complete Classic Series Collection, which even comes in an awesome Pizza Van for those die hards that love being a turtle.

5.title: Jean-Claude Van Damme & Self Serving Box Sets
5.plot: This week, Jonathan London gets a special guest from The Expendables 2, plays the Quentin Tarantino foot fetish game and breaks down the highlights of what's new to Blu-ray and DVD this week.

imdb.plot outline: Prefer watching movies at home? You're not alone. Every Tuesday, Jonathan London takes to the web to bring you reviews of the latest home entertainment releases to DVD, Blu-ray, VOD, and Streaming. Whenever possible, he also grants exclusive clips, images, and trailers from upcoming releases.
imdb.title: Pause/Play
plot: Each and every week, Jonathan London tells you exactly where your money goes as he breaks down that week's new releases on DVD, Blu-Ray, and OnDemand.::Metacafe
